column5: Noticed that I haven't posted any pics as of late...September was a beautiful month for fishing but totally fizzled out in terms of opportunities for me. Here's a little bit of what I've managed on a few visits to Minden and Muskoka since the end of August....hope you enjoy.   Gotta give my girl credit on this one...she grabbed the rod and was doing a crazy figure eight until the rockbass couldn't take it anymore!   Took this guy on a swammer in about 6 feet of water on a beautiful new piece of shoreline I discovered   Smallies in Muskoka were lovin' the wacky worm on Labour Day weekend....my brother slept in so I was forced to do the lame self pics....got a couple like this   When he finally woke up and hopped in the boat...a few casts with a minnow bait and he slammed this chunky fella. Not bad.   This one was a thriller...we had been swimming in Minden on the last weekend of September...water was a cool 65F...were drying off on the dock and saw this brute swimming by. I sprinted to the car for my rod, tossed out a Live Target smelt pattern and watched this guy react.   Back to Muskoka last weekend with Bicephalic and his brother....more smallies on the wacky worm   Eeeeee!!!!!   Bicephalic and his brother with a delayed double header....more minnow-baits in close to shore.   And that's about it...heading up to Minden this weekend....likely more family time than fishing....but...I'll try to manage a few more pics for the board  And I'll try to keep my shirt on
Those aren't the topless pics I was looking for!  Nice fish!
Great report!!Gotta love the wee ones when they catch fish Priceless. If i were you, i wouldnt be walking topless in the bush this fall, without some flourescent orange on you somewhere
I thought bear liked salmon not bass.
Hey nice looking sweater in pic #5. Angora?
Stay away from sheep shearing competions is all I gotta say. Nice shooting as well!.
good stuff. Now that the young one has mastered the figure 8 slap a bucktail on there and let her at them!
We may have just solved the sasquach mystery....   Nice pics! Looks like  great family fun.
nice report !!! and few nice bass to boot !!! cheers
Nice report and picture  Figure 8 for a rock bass, that's hilarious
